you can't bluff without raising. so you have to raise when you're not bluffing

minor: you can't raise first when you're not betting first

if people think you're always bluffing, you can never successfully bluff

you can't just bet according to the probabilites (kelly or pot odds) because then someone could bluff you every time



hand probability

str flush	 0.0311	
four         0.168	
full house   2.6		97.18 - 99.78
flush        3.03		94.15 - 97.18
straight     4.62		89.53 - 94.15
three        4.83		84.7  - 89.53
two pair    23.5		61.2  - 84.7
one pair    43.8		17.4  - 61.2
high card   17.4		


kelly betting: fraction of chips to bet

                      probability of best hand

pot odds| 0.000 0.100 0.200 0.300 0.400 0.500 0.600 0.700 0.800 0.900 1.000
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  0.250 |                                                 0.000 0.500 1.000
  0.500 |                                           0.100 0.400 0.700 1.000
  
  1.000 |                               0.000 0.200 0.400 0.600 0.800 1.000
  2.000 |                         0.100 0.250 0.400 0.550 0.700 0.850 1.000
  3.000 |                   0.067 0.200 0.333 0.467 0.600 0.733 0.867 1.000
  4.000 |             0.000 0.125 0.250 0.375 0.500 0.625 0.750 0.875 1.000
  5.000 |             0.040 0.160 0.280 0.400 0.520 0.640 0.760 0.880 1.000
  6.000 |             0.067 0.183 0.300 0.417 0.533 0.650 0.767 0.883 1.000
  7.000 |             0.086 0.200 0.314 0.429 0.543 0.657 0.771 0.886 1.000
  8.000 |             0.100 0.213 0.325 0.438 0.550 0.663 0.775 0.888 1.000
  9.000 |       0.000 0.111 0.222 0.333 0.444 0.556 0.667 0.778 0.889 1.000
 10.000 |       0.010 0.120 0.230 0.340 0.450 0.560 0.670 0.780 0.890 1.000
 
full house:
two possibilities:
	pocket pair + community triple
		given a community triple, each player has a 1/13 chance of a full house
		so with 6 players, ~6/13 
	


a234567890jqka   2card 1card
      xxx          3     0
      xxxx         1     2
      

  ccc		=> hhccc hccch ccchh
  cc c   => hcchc cchch
  c c c  => chchc
  
  cccc   => hcccc cccch cccchh
  cc cc  => cchcc cchcch
  
  cc  cc => cchhcc
  234567
  
  cc ccc => cchccc cchccch cc_ccchh
